title: PwC (PricewaterhouseCoopers)
description: PwC's brand colors include shades like warm orange tones ('FFB600', 'EB8C00') as well as formal grays and blacks ('000000', '2D2D2D', '464646', '7D7D7D'), complemented by a vibrant red ('E0301E') and cooler accents ('DB536A', 'D04A02'). These colors are part of PwC's visual identity, as detailed in their Visual Identity Guidance.
